casebody.data:
James Y. EVANS, Appellant(s)/Petitioner(s),
v.
ADVANCE SOUNDS AND PERFORMANCE, INC., Appellee(s)/Respondent(s), CASE NO.: 3D17-1949 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. NOVEMBER 13, 2017 ROTHENBERG, C.J., and SUAREZ and SALTER, JJ., concur.

Upon consideration, petitioner's motion for rehearing and reinstatement is hereby denied.
